item.title: CVE-2024-31110|2024-03-31T18:57:52.882Z -- Katz Web Services, Inc. -- Contact Form 7 Newsletter
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Katz Web Services, Inc. Contact Form 7 Newsletter allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Contact Form 7 Newsletter: from n/a through 2.2.
